mapper.select: INSERT INTO goods_sales (id, goods_id, sale_num, create_time,user_name,purchasing_price,sale_price) VALUES (#{id}, #{goodsId},#{saleNum}, #{createTime},#{userName},#{purchasingPrice},#{salePrice} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sale_num=#{saleNum};

SELECT sum(b.purchasing_price*b.sale_num) AS total_purchasing,sum(b.sale_price*b.sale_num) AS total_sale FROM goods a LEFT JOIN goods_sales b ON a.id=b.goods_id WHERE b.create_time>=#{startTime} AND b.create_time <= #{endTime}
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT SUM(b.purchasing_price*b.sale_num) AS total_purchasing,sum(b.sale_price*b.sale_num) AS total_sale,
b.create_time FROM goods_sales b WHERE b.create_time>=#{startTime} AND b.create_time <= #{endTime} group BY b.create_time
CONCAT(YEAR(b.create_time) ,"") as create_time FROM goods_sales b WHERE b.create_time>=#{startTime} AND b.create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY YEAR(b.create_time)*100
CONCAT(YEAR(b.create_time) ,"-", MONTH(b.create_time)) as create_time FROM goods_sales b WHERE b.create_time>=#{startTime} AND b.create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY YEAR(b.create_time)*100 + MONTH(b.create_time)
order by b.create_time asc
SELECT b.id,a.id AS goods_id,a.name, IFNULL(b.sale_num,0) AS sale_num,a.img FROM goods a LEFT JOIN goods_sales b ON a.id=b.goods_id WHERE b.id=#{id}

SELECT b.name, SUM(a.sale_num) as saleNum FROM goods_sales a LEFT JOIN goods b ON a.goods_id=b. id WHERE a.create_time>=#{startTime} AND a.create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY b.name ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT sum(a.sale_num) as value,b.type FROM goods_sales a LEFT JOIN goods b ON a.goods_id=b.id WHERE a.create_time>=#{startTime} AND a.create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY b.type
